autoscaling.core.autoscale¶

Define the autoscale() method.

autoscaling.core.autoscale.autoscale(prob, autoscaler)¶

Scale the given problem using the scaling data encapsulated by the given autoscaler helper object.

Parameters:
  • prob (Problem) – Dymos problem to be scaled. Should be single-phase and dynamically-constrained.
  • autoscaler (AutoScaler) – Autoscaling helper object.
autoscaling.core.autoscale.phase_times(phase, sc)¶

Gets set of local names corresponding to time information relative to phase. Resulting set contains ‘t_initial’, ‘t_duration’, both, or neither.
